item.title: Sade - By Your Side
item.description:
You think I’d leave
your side baby
You know me
better than that
You think I’d leave
you down
When you’re down
on your knees
I wouldn’t do
that
I’ll tell you
you’re right
When you want
ah ha ha ha ha woo
If only
you could see into me
Oh when you’re cold
I’ll be there
Hold you tight
to me
When you’re
on the outside baby
And you can’t get in
I will show you
You’re so much
better than you know
When you’re lost
and you’re alone
And you can’t get
back again
I will find you
darling
And I’ll
bring you home
If you want
to cry
I am here
to dry your eyes
And in no time
you’ll be fine
You think I’d leave
your side baby
You know me
better than that
You think I’d leave
you down
When you’re down
on your knees
I wouldn’t do
that
I’ll tell you
you’re right
When you want
ah ha ha ha ha woo
If only
you could see into me
Oh when you’re cold
I’ll be there
Hold you tight
to me
Oh when you’re low
I’ll be there
By your side
baby
Oh when you’re cold
I’ll be there
Hold you tight
to me
Oh when you’re low
I’ll be there
By your side
baby
